div.span: Yuma Union High School District’s websites serve as a resource to the community and beyond, in order to provide current information about our schools, access to staff, and opportunities to deliver interactive services 24 hours a day, 7 days of the week. YUHSD makes every effort to ensure that published information is accurate and current. However, YUHSD makes no claims or guarantees about the absolute accuracy, completeness, or adequacy of the contents of its websites and expressly disclaims liability for errors and omissions in the contents. Any person or entity that relies on any information obtained from this system does so at their own risk.

Yuma Union High School District’s websites serve as a resource to the community and beyond, in order to provide current information about our schools, access to staff, and opportunities to deliver interactive services 24 hours a day, 7 days of the week. YUHSD makes every effort to ensure that published information is accurate and current. However, YUHSD makes no claims or guarantees about the absolute accuracy, completeness, or adequacy of the contents of its websites and expressly disclaims liability for errors and omissions in the contents. Any person or entity that relies on any information obtained from this system does so at their own risk.
